scripts.vm:provision: multipass launch --name umbrel-dev --cpus 4 --memory 8G --disk 50G --mount $PWD:/opt/umbrel-mount 23.10 && multipass exec umbrel-dev -- /opt/umbrel-mount/scripts/vm provision
scripts.vm:logs: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- journalctl -u umbreld-production -u umbreld -u ui -f -n 100
scripts.vm:client: npm run --silent vm:exec -- UMBREL_DATA_DIR=./data UMBREL_TRPC_ENDPOINT=http://localhost/trpc npm --prefix packages/umbreld run --silent start -- client
